title: Zhu - Genesis Series
description:
Genesis Seriesâ€ is the forthcoming project to come from Steven Zhu, better known as electronic music producer and singer-songwriter ZHU. It was released on November 6th via Columbia Records.
He returns after the Grammy nominated debut single â€œFadedâ€ which managed a respectable #3 position in the UK Chart but did top the UK Dance Chart.
â€œFadedâ€ released in March 2014 and was the lead single to be taken from his debut extended play â€œThe Nightdayâ€œ, which released on digital retailers on 20 April 2014 via Mind of a Genius.
The new project is set to feature electronic heavyweights Skrillex, DJ Snake and A-Trak alongside rappers and other talented musicians! The idea behind it is to bridge the gap between his last EP and his forthcoming full-length studio album â€œGeneration Whyâ€ â€“ due to release later this year!

1. Automatic (feat. AlunaGeorge)
2. As Crazy As It Is (ZHU x A-Trak x Keznamdi)
3. Testarossa (feat. Gallant)
4. Hold Up, Wait a Minute (ZHU x Bone Thugs-N-Harmony x Trombone Shorty)
5. Modern Conversation (ZHU x Vancouver Sleep Clinic x Daniel Johns)
6. Working For It (ZHU x Skrillex x THEY.)
